title: BIOMEGA AMS
description:
Biomega AMS is a uniquely designed, stylish and  low maintenance electric bike that is well suited to cycling in the city.

Special parts to compare when testing:

Carbon belt drive

Front wheel motor

374.4 Wh battery, 45–65 km range

title: CONWAY 200 ETS
description:
The Conway ETS 200 SE is a sporty electric bike that is also well suited for cycling on a variety of road surfaces, in bad weather conditions and hilly areas. It has a powerful and advanced mid-drive electric motor with dynamic gear shift sensoring, along with other cycling detection for a responsive cycling experience. It comes with a large battery for long journeys.



Special parts to compare when testing:

Bosch ‘Performance CX’ mid-drive motor

11 Ah / 500 Wh battery (PowerPack 400). 40 – 150 km range.

title: CONWAY 300
description:
The Conway eCC 300 SE is a sporty electric bike that is also well suited for cycling on a variety of road surfaces, in bad weather conditions and hilly areas. It has a powerful and advanced mid-drive electric motor with dynamic gear shift sensoring, along with other cycling detection for a responsive cycling experience. It comes with a large battery for long journeys.

 

Special parts to compare when testing:

Bosch ‘Performance CX’ mid-drive motor

500 Wh battery (PowerPack 500). 70 – 180km range.

title: IMPULSE SPEED PEDELEC
description:
Med denne Victoria E-Spezial 10.6 er det muligt at køre op til 45 km/t med assistance fra centermotoren. Cyklen er perfekt, hvis du fx har en længere distance til arbejde, og den egner sig godt til ture uden for byen og på lange, åbne strækninger.

 

Det er nu lovligt at køre på speed pedelecs på cykelstier i Danmark uden nummerplade og knallertkørekort (hvis man er over 18 år). Læs mere om lovgivningen omkring speed pedelecs.

title: 8 FREIGHT
description:
8 Freight longtail ladcykel er ideel til at transportere store og tunge ting (som ville blokere cyklistens udsyn, hvis laddet var foran). 8 Freight er udviklet af den anerkendte cykeldesigner Mike Burrows og kunne ses som den omvendte version af en long john (læs om her, hvordan den er i sammenligning med en Bullit long john).

Særlige dele, der kan sammenlignes ved testning:

Lad. Maks. vægt 100 kg

title: ADDBIKE
description:
AddBike is a cargo bike conversion kit that quickly and easily transforms your everyday 2 wheel bicycle into a 3 wheel cargo bike (with an advanced ‘double-tilting’ steering design). The AddBike also comes with 2 optional add-ons ideal for transporting a child (Carry’Box Kid) and cargo (Carry’Box).

 

The AddBike simply replaces the font wheel and attaches to the bike in under a minute. It is equipped with hydraulic brakes that are controlled by a single brake lever mounted to the handlebars. Maximum weight of load: 35 kg

 

The AddBike is designed, manufactured and assembled in France. Bicycle Innovation Lab is the sole distributor for Denmark.

title: KARMAKANON
description:
This Karmakanon is known as ‘Vesterbrokarmakanonen’. Karmakanon custom build sound system cargo bikes in Christiania, Copenhagen. Their sound bikes are mainly used for demonstrations, Critical Mass and parties.

 

Our Karmakanon battery is charged by mains and solar panel. It also powers normal 230v devices. We’ve added a microphone for speeches & singing as well as a cable to play music from a phone or laptop.  

 

To borrow this bike, we ask for a donation on top of the membership fee to raise funds for redesigning our Karmakanon to make it more stable, easier to ride and bicycle innovation lab specific.

 

We also collaborate with Karmakanon to develop customised battery powered utility cargo bikes used by businesses and public organisations.

title: TERN CARGO NODE
description:
The Cargo Node is an adaptable bike that opens up a lot of possibilities for transportation. It has great cargo carrying capacity due to it’s long rack (that is optimised to fit 2 child bike seats) and versatile pannier bags. This light cargo bike also quickly folds so is easy to take on public transport.   



Special parts to compare when testing:

Xtracycle extender and pannier CarryAll bags

title: TRIOBIKE BOXTER
description: The Triobike Boxter design is based on the Christiania cargo bike but has a single plastic cast box, is lighter and faster. There is also a choice of colourful rain covers and seats for 2 or 4 children.

title: BROMPTON CITY
description:
Bromptoncyklen foldes sammen uden værktøj på ca. 15-20 sekunder. Det er en af de mest kompakte foldecykler i verden.Sammenfoldet er cyklen 58,5 cm lang x 56,5 cm høj x 27 cm bred. Håndbygget stålstel i London.



Cyklen kører som en almindelig cykel.



Særlige dele, der kan sammenlignes ved testning:

3 gears
